items.question: What happens after the one-time installation?
items.answer: After installation, you own and control the entire system. We provide documentation and initial support, but there are no ongoing fees. You can manage, modify, or expand the system as needed.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
items.answer: We offer optional support contracts for ongoing maintenance, updates, and technical assistance. However, our systems are designed to be self-sufficient after installation.

items.question: Can I customize the services to my specific needs?
items.answer: Absolutely! We can customize any service or create entirely custom solutions. Contact us to discuss your specific requirements and get a tailored quote.

items.question: What infrastructure do I need?
items.answer: Most services can be deployed on a single server or VPS. We'll assess your needs during consultation and recommend the appropriate infrastructure setup.

items.question: How long does installation take?
items.answer: Most individual services take 1-3 days to deploy. Larger packages may take 1-2 weeks depending on complexity and customization requirements.
